paragraphs: Backend Software Engineer with 4+ years of experience specializing in distributed systems, data pipelines, and cloud-native applications. Expert in Go, Python, and modern backend technologies.

Currently contributing to renewable energy monitoring solutions at Univers (QoS Energy), where I develop scalable communication interfaces and optimize data processing pipelines. Previously built high-performance systems at EXFO for network service assurance.

Passionate about clean code, system design, and DevOps practices. Experience with microservices architecture, message queuing systems (RabbitMQ, Kafka), container orchestration (Kubernetes), and cloud platforms (AWS, Azure).
Strong advocate for continuous learning and knowledge sharing. I believe in building robust, maintainable systems that solve real-world problems while mentoring teams to deliver exceptional results.
